languages.text: "Психоэмоциональный окрас полученного сообщения выдает высокую озабоченность, однако за ней также скрывается нечто, что астропатам не удалось облечь в слова. Если позволите, я считаю необходимым рассказать Дому Орселлио правду. В противном случае возможен конфликт с Навис Нобилите, что, в условиях нынешнего состояния Простора Коронус, лишь сыграет на руку врагам Империума".

traits.locale_text: "Психоэмоциональный окрас полученного сообщения выдает высокую озабоченность, однако за ней также скрывается нечто, что астропатам не удалось облечь в слова. Если позволите, я считаю необходимым рассказать дому Орселлио правду. В противном случае возможен конфликт с Навис Нобилите, что, в условиях нынешнего состояния Коронуса, лишь сыграет на руку врагам Империума".

languages.text: "The psycho-emotional coding of the received message betrays acute concern, but it also contains something that the Astropaths have failed to put into words. If you'll excuse my forthrightness, I feel it is necessary to tell House Orsellio the truth. Otherwise, a conflict with the Navis Nobilite is possible, which, given the current state of the Koronus Expanse, will only play into the hands of the enemies of the Imperium."
languages.original_text: "Психоэмоциональный окрас полученного сообщения выдает высокую озабоченность, однако за ней также скрывается нечто, что астропатам не удалось облечь в слова. Если позволите, я считаю необходимым рассказать Дому Орселлио правду. В противном случае возможен конфликт с Навис Нобилите, что, в условиях нынешнего состояния Простора Коронус, лишь сыграет на руку врагам Империума".

traits.locale_text: "The psycho-emotional coding of the received message betrays high concern, but it also hides something that the astropaths have failed to put into words. If you'll excuse me expressing my mind, I feel it's necessary to tell Orsellio House the truth. Otherwise, a conflict with the Navis Nobilite is possible, which, taking into account current state of Koronus Expanse, will only play into the hands of the enemies of the Imperium.

"The psycho-emotional coding of the received message betrays high concern, but it also hides something that the astropaths have failed to put into words. If you'll excuse me expressing my mind, I feel it's necessary to tell Orsellio House the truth. Otherwise, a conflict with the Navis Nobilite is possible, which, taking into account current state of Koronus Expanse, will only play into the hands of the enemies of the Imperium.

If you'll excuse my forthrightness, I feel it is necessary to tell House Orsellio the truth. Otherwise, a conflict with the Navis Nobilite is possible, which, given the current state of the Koronus Expanse, will only play into the hands of the enemies of the Imperium.

"The psycho-emotional coding of the received message betrays acute concern, but it also contains something that the Astropaths have failed to put into words. If you'll excuse my forthrightness, I feel it is necessary to tell House Orsellio the truth. Otherwise, a conflict with the Navis Nobilite is possible, which, given the current state of the Koronus Expanse, will only play into the hands of the enemies of the Imperium.

"The psycho-emotional coding of the received message betrays acute concern, but it also contains something that the Astropaths have failed to put into words. If you'll excuse my forthrightness, I feel it is necessary to tell House Orsellio the truth. Otherwise, a conflict with the Navis Nobilite is possible, which, given the current state of the Koronus Expanse, will only play into the hands of the enemies of the Imperium."

languages.text: “这条信息的情绪编码带有极为深重的忧虑，但也同样传达了那些星语者未能用语言表达的东西。希望您能原谅我的直率，我认为有必要将真相告知奥赛罗家族，否则我们可能会与导航宗族发生冲突。鉴于科罗努斯扩区的现状，这样的冲突只会为帝国的敌人带来益处。”
languages.original_text: "The psycho-emotional coding of the received message betrays acute concern, but it also contains something that the Astropaths have failed to put into words. If you'll excuse my forthrightness, I feel it is necessary to tell House Orsellio the truth. Otherwise, a conflict with the Navis Nobilite is possible, which, given the current state of the Koronus Expanse, will only play into the hands of the enemies of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “这条信息的情绪编码带有极为深重的忧虑，但也同样传达了那些星语者未能用语言表达的东西。希望您能原谅我的直率，我认为有必要将真相告知奥塞罗家族，否则我们可能会与导航宗族发生冲突。鉴于科罗努斯扩区的现状，这样的冲突只会为帝国的敌人带来益处。”

languages.text: «La codificación psicoemocional del mensaje recibido transmite una gran preocupación, pero también algo que los astrópatas no han conseguido expresar con palabras. Si me permite franqueza, creo que es necesario decirle la verdad a la casa Orsellio. De no ser así, podría causar un conflicto con la Navis Nobilite, lo que, dado el estado actual de la Extensión de Koronus, solo les facilitaría las cosas a los enemigos del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "The psycho-emotional coding of the received message betrays acute concern, but it also contains something that the Astropaths have failed to put into words. If you'll excuse my forthrightness, I feel it is necessary to tell House Orsellio the truth. Otherwise, a conflict with the Navis Nobilite is possible, which, given the current state of the Koronus Expanse, will only play into the hands of the enemies of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: «La codificación psicoemocional del mensaje recibido transmite una gran preocupación, pero también algo que los astrópatas no han conseguido expresar con palabras. Si me permite franqueza, creo que es necesario decirle la verdad a la casa Orsellio. De no ser así, podría causar un conflicto con la Navis Nobilite, lo que, dado el estado actual de la Extensión de Koronus, solo les facilitaría las cosas a los enemigos del Imperium».

languages.text: "Die psycho-emotionale Kodierung der empfangenen Nachricht lässt keine akute Sorge vermuten, enthält aber einen Subtext, den die Astropathen nicht in Worte fassen konnten. Verzeiht mir meine Offenheit, aber ich denke, wir sollten Haus Orsellio die Wahrheit sagen. Andernfalls wäre ein Konflikt mit der Navis Nobilite möglich, der angesichts des derzeitigen Zustandes der Koronus-Ausdehnung allein den Feinden des Imperiums in die Hände spielen würde."
languages.original_text: "The psycho-emotional coding of the received message betrays acute concern, but it also contains something that the Astropaths have failed to put into words. If you'll excuse my forthrightness, I feel it is necessary to tell House Orsellio the truth. Otherwise, a conflict with the Navis Nobilite is possible, which, given the current state of the Koronus Expanse, will only play into the hands of the enemies of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Die psycho-emotionale Kodierung der empfangenen Nachricht lässt keine akute Sorge vermuten, enthält aber einen Subtext, den die Astropathen nicht in Worte fassen konnten. Verzeiht mir meine Offenheit, aber ich denke, wir sollten Haus Orsellio die Wahrheit sagen. Andernfalls wäre ein Konflikt mit der Navis Nobilite möglich, der angesichts des derzeitigen Zustandes der Koronus-Ausdehnung allein den Feinden des Imperiums in die Hände spielen würde."

languages.text: « Le codage psycho-émotionnel du message reçu trahit une vive inquiétude, mais nos astropathes décèlent aussi la présence d'un autre sentiment qu'ils ne parviennent pas à exprimer. Excusez ma franchise, mais je pense qu'il est nécessaire de dire la vérité à la maison Orsellio pour éviter tout conflit avec la Navis Nobilite qui pourrait faire le jeu des ennemis de l'Imperium. Surtout au vu de la situation dans les Étendues de Koronus. »
languages.original_text: "The psycho-emotional coding of the received message betrays acute concern, but it also contains something that the Astropaths have failed to put into words. If you'll excuse my forthrightness, I feel it is necessary to tell House Orsellio the truth. Otherwise, a conflict with the Navis Nobilite is possible, which, given the current state of the Koronus Expanse, will only play into the hands of the enemies of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: « Le codage psycho-émotionnel du message reçu trahit une vive inquiétude, mais nos astropathes décèlent aussi la présence d'un autre sentiment qu'ils ne parviennent pas à exprimer. Excusez ma franchise, mais je pense qu'il est nécessaire de dire la vérité à la maison Orsellio pour éviter tout conflit avec la Navis Nobilite qui pourrait faire le jeu des ennemis de l'Imperium. Surtout au vu de la situation dans les Étendues de Koronus. »

languages.text: 「受け取ったメッセージに含まれる精神感情のコーディングは、深く心配する気持ちを示していますが、感応通信官が文字で表現できなかった感情も入っています。単刀直入に言って申し訳ないのですが、オーセリオ家に真実を伝える必要性を感じています。そうしないと、航宙貴族と争いが起きかねません。コロヌス・エクスパンスの現状を考えると、帝国の敵の思うツボになってしまいます」
languages.original_text: "The psycho-emotional coding of the received message betrays acute concern, but it also contains something that the Astropaths have failed to put into words. If you'll excuse my forthrightness, I feel it is necessary to tell House Orsellio the truth. Otherwise, a conflict with the Navis Nobilite is possible, which, given the current state of the Koronus Expanse, will only play into the hands of the enemies of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「受け取ったメッセージに含まれる精神感情のコーディングは、深く心配する気持ちを示していますが、感応通信官が文字で表現できなかった感情も入っています。単刀直入に言って申し訳ないのですが、オーセリオ家に真実を伝える必要性を感じています。そうしないと、航宙貴族と争いが起きかねません。コロヌス・エクスパンスの現状を考えると、帝国の敵の思うツボになってしまいます」

languages.text: "Alınan mesajın psikoduygusal kodlamasından derin kaygı duyulduğu anlaşılıyor. Fakat Astropatların dilleri dönmediği için belirtemedikleri bir şey de var. Dobralığımı bağışlayın ama Orsellio Hanesi'ne hakikati söylememiz gerektiğini düşünüyorum. Aksi hâlde Navis Nobilite ile çatışmaya girebiliriz. Koronus Enginliği'nin mevcut vaziyetini düşünürsek bu, bir tek İmparatorluk düşmanlarının işine yarar."
languages.original_text: "The psycho-emotional coding of the received message betrays acute concern, but it also contains something that the Astropaths have failed to put into words. If you'll excuse my forthrightness, I feel it is necessary to tell House Orsellio the truth. Otherwise, a conflict with the Navis Nobilite is possible, which, given the current state of the Koronus Expanse, will only play into the hands of the enemies of the Imperium."
